page.title: Rumsfeld Doesn't Expect Civil War in Iraq
page.text: NEW YORK - Defense Secretary Donald Rumsfeld said Monday he does not expect civil war in Iraq and pointed to the recent retaking of the former insurgent stronghold of Samarra as evidence of progress in stabilizing the country before elections in January. "I don't think it's going to happen," Rumsfeld told the Council on Foreign Relations when asked about the threat of civil war...
